About
                                            Baheer Group (BG)
Baheer Group (BG) is a prominent manufacturer and provider of high-quality papers and paper products, offering premium solutions in Papers, Packaging, Printing, Mines & Energy, and supplying state-of-the-art Printing Machineries. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our diversified portfolio, which caters to both domestic and international markets. Backed by an extensive Group of Companies, BG consistently surpasses industry standards, specializing in customized products tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.
Job Summary
We are seeking an experienced Full stack developer to join our team. This role is suited for a developer who has worked on production systems, understands modern development workflows, and can contribute effectively to both backend and frontend development in a professional environment.
The ideal candidate is comfortable working with established systems, writing high-quality code, and collaborating with other engineers to deliver reliable and scalable software solutions.
Duties & Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain web applications using Laravel on the backend and React (TypeScript, React Query) on the frontend
Build and maintain clean, scalable, and maintainable backend services and APIs
Develop user-facing features using modern frontend practices
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions
Review code, provide constructive feedback, and help maintain high engineering standards
Optimize application performance, database queries, and system reliability
Work with Git and GitHub in a collaborative, team-based workflow
Use Docker for development, testing, and deployment environments
Participate in system improvements, refactoring, and technical decision-making
Contribute to documentation and technical knowledge sharing
Job Requirements
Strong professional experience with Laravel (PHP) in production environments
Solid experience with React.js, TypeScript and modern JavaScript development
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience designing and consuming RESTful APIs
Good understanding of relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, or similar)
Proficiency with Git and GitHub (branching strategies, pull requests, code reviews)
Practical experience using Docker in real projects
Ability to write clean, readable, and well-structured code
Experience working in a collaborative, professional software team
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Submission Guideline
Baheer Group is an excellent place to grow your career. Don't hesitate to apply. the vacant position.
Please note only short-listed candidates will be contacted for an interview.
Meanwhile: send a copy of your application to the below email while applying
vp@baheer.af

About
                                            I Engineering Group
ieng Group provides EPC and O&M infrastructure services with a focus on the telecom and power industries. The Group's subsidiaries Eki.Struct (tower) and GreenPole (power), along with its affiliated asset management company CREI complement the functions provided by ieng.
Established in 2007, the Group is a leading provider of telecom infrastructure and managed services in Africa and Emerging Markets.
We have grown rapidly since our inception in 2007 and are now operational in 19 countries: Afghanistan, Algeria, Cameroon, Central African Republic, Chad, DR Congo, Ethiopia, Ghana, Guinea, Kenya, KSA, Lebanon, Liberia, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, Philippines, South Sudan and Uganda.
Today, we maintain over 31,200+ sites for Africaโs largest MNOs and all TowerCos.
Our vision
To become the leading Engineering Procurement and Construction (EPC) and Operation and Maintenance (O&M) contractor in global emerging markets.
๏ปฟOur Mission
We provide EPC and O&M services to the telecom, renewable energy and construction industries in global emerging markets, seamlessly integrating our core competencies with our customersโ businesses, so they benefit from competitive and comprehensive solutions.
Job Summary
ieng Afghanistan is seeking highly skilled Huawei experts for RAN to join our team. The ideal candidate must have extensive experience with Huawei networks and equipment. This role involves leading network swap, network planning, optimization, troubleshooting, and maintenance efforts to ensure the highest performance and reliability of network.
Attractive package will be offered
Duties & Responsibilities
ยทยยยยยยยProvide Analysis and monitoring Network performance by Checking Key Quality Indicators (KQI's)
ยทยยยยยยยMonitor and demarcating service degradation (Voice and Data) by checking performance of the network nodes
ยทยยยยยยยKnowledge of performance counters of RAN and Core KPIโs to make sure that all necessary counters are activated for daily, weekly, monthly and critical outages.
ยทยยยยยยยUsing Big Data analytics to provide trend analysis for KQI/KPI and provide suggestions and solution on performance improvement
ยทยยยยยยยCustomer proactive support using signaling call flows and big data analytics to improve Customer experience.
ยทยยยยยยยInvestigate and analyze individual User complaints for " CS and PS" services, international link's (link utilization, call performance)
ยทยยยยยยยMapping between KPI's & KQI's that's related to worst cell/Site/Node analysis to assist relevant team in improving network performance.
ยทยยยยยยยDetect value added cases by analyzing which KPI affect services.
ยทยยยยยยยReviewing and making guidelines for network performance and people management.
ยทยยยยยยยManaging day-to-day Network KPIs and performed required analysis to improve the service delivery
ยทยยยยยยยReview of various reports (Site outage report, KPI reports, Daily CR report, Pending Outage Reports).
ยทยยยยยยยChecking and reviewing of the KPIs and SLA of the TTโs created by Monitoring team.
ยทยยยยยยยTechnical review of the work orders change request which are impacting the NOC monitoring.
ยทยยยยยยยProviding post incident report and Root cause analysis for Major and Critical Incidents and User complaints.
ยทยยยยยยยExpert knowledge of U2020, BSC, RNC, 2G, 3G, LTE/5G technologies and Huawei RAN solutions.
ยทยยยยยยEmpower local RAN team to do complex task and train them daily, weekly and monthly basis.
ยทยยยยยยยProven experience in leading large-scale RAN projects and optimization initiatives.
ยทยยยยยยNetwork deployment and implementation to oversee installation and configuration of RAN components and ensure equipment is step according design and standards.
ยทยยยยCapacity Management to assess network traffic and make sure that each interface has enough capacity to handle peak hours traffic.
ยทยยยยTrouble shooting and Problem Resolution to analyze problem, degradation and other RAN KPIs.
ยทยยยยยUse available or third partiesโ or specialized software tools for network analysis and trouble shooting.
ยทยยยยTechnology Upgrades and Updates, Ability to migrate from vendor to Vendor and advance wireless technology.
OH&S/QMS Role and Responsibilities:
Reports any hazards or risks in addition to Accidents/Incident to QHSE department.
Be aware of and complies to i engineeringโs IMS Policy.
Abides by i engineeringโs Local Legal and Client Requirements.
Attends and engages in IMS Awareness Sessions.
Ensures that all IMS procedures are regularly followed and raises the issue when they are not
Job Requirements
ยทยยยยยยยMinimum 5 years of experience.
ยทยยยยยยยBSc. in /Electrical/IT, Telecom Engineering/Computer Engineering
ยทยยยยยยยExcellent presentation skills.
ยทยยยยยยยMust have strong telecom skills and knowledge of common programs such as Microsoft Office.
ยทยยยยยยยAbility to work under pressure.
๏ปฟ๏ปฟ๏ปฟ๏ปฟ
ยทยยยยยยยStrong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and make data-driven decisions.
ยทยยยยยยยExcellent communication, presentation, and client-facing abilities.
Submission Guideline
Please ensure to write the position title and vacancy number in the subject line of your email, and send your CV along with a cover letter. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

HMIS Data Assistance
MAGNA,
                                        Kunduz, Afghanistan
Apply Now
Bachelor's Degree
Kunduz, Afghanistan
(Kunduz)
Full Time
1438
48
About
                                            MAGNA
MAGNA
is a medical humanitarian organization that has been actively working worldwide and providing humanitarian aid for more than 20 years. Now our projects cover about 15 countries. The largest programs are deployed in
Congo (DR), Syria, South Sudan, Iraq, Afghanistan and Ukraine
. We implement our humanitarian aid projects by working directly with the medical institutions and supporting doctors provided direct emergency medical care to patients who need it.
MAGNA
operates internationally and provides assistance to children and their families in need, including victims of natural disasters, wars and conflicts. In the field we maintain doctors and medical staff but also technical and other specialists, providing humanitarian assistance and help to treat children and their families.
MAGNA
focusing on
Health, Nutrition and MHPSS
projects, primarily aimed at saving lives and alleviating the suffering of those in need. Armed conflicts and unstable political situations have a devastating impact on ordinary people. Consequences, often associated with inadequate local health services, commonly include direct violence, forced displacement, epidemics, famine, and psychological trauma. Providing medical assistance to victims of conflicts and crises is MAGNA workersโ top priority. Alleviating suffering from infectious diseases neglected by local structures is another major area of MAGNAโs focus.
MAGNA
has a zero tolerance policy with regard to Sexual Exploitation and Abuse by MAGNAโs personnel against the people they serve. Protection from Sexual Exploitation and Abuse (PSEA) is the responsibility of everyone and all selected candidates will be required to comply with MAGNAโs PSEA Policy at all times. Selected candidates will therefore undergo rigorous reference and background checks against their past behavior related to sexual exploitation and abuse, and may be required to provide additional information further on in the selection process.
Job Summary
Defining, coordinating and monitoring all data related activities including data collection, analysis, reporting, monitoring and evaluation processes according to
MAGNA
protocols, standards and procedures in order to ensure quality medical care for patients and their communities and to improve the health condition of the population
Duties & Responsibilities
Accountabilities:
-ยยยยยยData Entry and Monitoring, assist with daily data entry tasks for the health facilities (clinics, hospitals, health centers) and support the establishment of monitoring tools for data collection processes.
-ยยยยยยData Verification, ensure that all collected data is accurate, consistent, and aligned with the project's indicators. Perform regular checks to ensure the quality and completeness of data.
-ยยยยยยTechnical Assistance, provide technical support and guidance to the health care providers and data entry team on how to use HMIS tools for data entry. Help resolve issues related to data collection.
-ยยยยยยData Analysis Support, assist in analyzing collected data to identify trends, gaps, and key performance indicators (KPIs). Support the review and assessment of data to ensure project targets are being met.
-ยยยยยยReporting and Feedback, assist in the preparation of monthly and quarterly reports on analyzed data. Provide feedback to the health facilities on the status of their data quality and suggest areas for improvement.
-ยยยยยยCapacity Building Support, assist in identifying and addressing training needs for the health facilities' staff related to HMIS. Participate in on-the-job training sessions to improve skills in data entry, quality control, and analysis.
-ยยยยยยHR Coordination, support the HR department in monitoring the training and development needs of the data entry staff. Assist in the organization of training or induction programs for new data team members.
-ยยยยยยSupport Project Teams, attend regular internal meetings and training sessions, such as MAGNA's coordination meetings and trainings, to contribute to team updates and feedback. Participate in the dissemination of project-related information to the team.
-ยยยยยยData Update and Communication, ensure that all HMIS data collection tools are updated regularly. Assist in sharing relevant updates with team members and healthcare providers to ensure consistent communication of expectations.
-ยยยยยยReport Preparation, support the preparation and submission of regular data reports to the Ministry of Health (MoPH), donors, and MAGNA. Ensure reports are accurate, complete, and submitted on time.
-ยยยยยยTeam Collaboration, work closely with the medical team and health supervisors to ensure proper data collection and entry practices. Participate in collaborative team efforts to assess and improve data handling processes.
-ยยยยยยยยAdditional Tasks, perform any other tasks assigned by the supervisor to support the success of the project, including assisting with other administrative or operational activities as needed
Context Specific Accountabilities:
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will assist with daily data entry tasks for the health facilities (clinics, hospitals, health centers) and support the establishment of monitoring tools for data collection processes.
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will help review and adapt HMIS data collection tools to meet the projectโs needs and indicators, under the guidance of the HMIS Manager.
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will ensure that all HMIS data collection tools are updated regularly. Assist in sharing relevant updates with team members and healthcare providers to ensure consistent communication of expectations.
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will ensure the regular supply of HMIS tools to the health facilities, and he will maintain the supply of HMIS tools on need based to the health facilities.
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will assist in ensuring that all staff follow the HMIS Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) for data collection and documentation.
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will assist with the verification and validation of collected data to maintain consistency and quality at all health facility levels.
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will ensure that all collected data is accurate, consistent, and aligned with the project's indicators. Perform regular checks to ensure the quality and completeness of data.
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will help in analyzing key project indicators and comparing collected data with project targets to assess the performance of activities and identify areas for improvement.
-ยยยยยยยยยยยHe will ensure that all patient data and sensitive information are handled with full respect and maintained confidentially in accordance with privacy guidelines.
He will perform any other tasks assigned by the supervisor to support the success of the project, including assisting with other administrative or operational activities as needed
Job Requirements
Education
MD/ Nursing degree from recognized institute
Experience
At least 2 years of experience in HMIS and Data entry.
Submission Guideline
Interested and Qualified applicants can send their application and CV to the following email:
personal-adm-mng@af.magna.org
No other type of submission will be accepted.
Please mention the vacancy number and position name in the subject line of the email. Otherwise, you will not be shortlisted.
Regarding MAGNA recruitment process, please note that!
ยทยยยยยยยยMAGNA will conduct its recruitment on the basis of need only.
ยทยยยยยยยยMAGNA commits to a fair and transparent recruitment procedure.
ยทยยยยยยยยOnly HR department will contact you during the recruitment process.
ยทยยยยยยยยMAGNA may keep data of your application for its pool of candidate and might propose to you another position than the one you applied for based on your qualification.
Only short-listed candidates whose application responds to the criteria will be contacted & local applicants from the same province are encouraged to apply and will be given priority.

About
                                            Kabul Space Logistic & Technology Services
Welcome to KabulSpace
, a premier
software development and IT solutions
company headquartered in Kabul, Afghanistan. We specialize in creating tailored digital applications, offering end-to-end services from custom software design to system integration and consulting.
Our expertise extends to enterprise networking and mission-critical network infrastructure, ensuring reliable support and scalability for businesses. With a skilled and passionate team, we deliver innovative, efficient, and customer-focused solutions that empower organizations, whether private enterprises or non-governmental entities, to thrive in a dynamic technological landscape. Letโs shape the future together!
Job Summary
As a senior Android application developer (Java
SE within Gradle) atยKabulspace, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining secure and complex mobile applications.
You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet our client's needs and enhance user experience with a focus on real-time end-to-end encrypted communication.
Duties & Responsibilities
Developing and maintaining Enterprise Android applications using Java SE.
Knowledge of real-time communication features and protocols.
Knowledge of restful web API and Microservices.
Utilize Git and GitHub for version control, code reviews, and collaborative development.
Analyze, debug, and test existing mobile applications, considering performance, processes, and productivity.
Participating in software testing processes such as unit testing, automated functional testing and integration testing to ensure app stability and performance.
Collaborate with product managers, UI/UX designers, and other developers to define project requirements and specifications.
Write clean, scalable, and efficient code following best practices and coding standards.
Conduct code reviews, provide feedback, and mentor junior developers.
Provide mentoring and training to junior developers and collaborate closely with the management team to provide status updates, challenges, and progress reports.
Work under the supervision of the sub-directorate and provide regular tasks status update, challenges and reports to the management as per the service level agreement (SLA).
Write and maintain technical documentation, API guides, and user manuals.
Perform any other duties related to the role assigned by the management.
Training and support for other team members.
Job Requirements
Bachelorโs degree in Computer Science, Information System, or a related field.
3+ years of professional experience in mobile application development.
Proficiency in Android Studio and Gradle structure.
Knowledge of end-to-end encryption protocols.
Experience with real-time communication protocols.
Experience in integrating third-party libraries for real-time messaging
Familiarity with data encryption and data encryption protocols.
Technical experience with database systems such as mnesia, PostgreSQL, MariaDB, and SQLite.
Knowledge of NoSQL databases for backend scaling.
Solid understanding of RESTful APIs, JSON/XML data handling, and API integration.
Experience with debugging tools, performance optimization, and memory profiling.
Preferred Qualifications:
Knowledge of containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.
Experience implementing CI/CD pipelines for mobile application deployment.
Knowledge of DevOps practices for mobile application deployment.
Submission Guideline
Applicants are required to mention the Job Title and Vacancy # in the subject line of their email. Please attach your updated CV and a cover letter and send them to
hr@kabulspace.af
, with a copy (CC) to
kabulspace2025@gmail.com
. The application deadline is 10-Aug-2025, so ensure your submission is sent before this date.
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview and a demo session. We look forward to receiving your applications
.

About
                                            Kabul Space Logistic & Technology Services
Welcome to KabulSpace
, a premier
software development and IT solutions
company headquartered in Kabul, Afghanistan. We specialize in creating tailored digital applications, offering end-to-end services from custom software design to system integration and consulting.
Our expertise extends to enterprise networking and mission-critical network infrastructure, ensuring reliable support and scalability for businesses. With a skilled and passionate team, we deliver innovative, efficient, and customer-focused solutions that empower organizations, whether private enterprises or non-governmental entities, to thrive in a dynamic technological landscape. Letโs shape the future together!
Job Summary
Job Summary:
As a senior iOS application developer at the Kabulspace, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining complex iOS applications. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet our clientsโ needs and enhance user experience.
Duties & Responsibilities
Key Responsibilities:
iOS App Development:
Develop and maintain iOS applications using Swift and/or Objective-C.
Ensure seamless integration of UI/UX designs within the iOS ecosystem (UIKit, SwiftUI).
Real-Time Communication:
Work with real-time communication messaging protocols and libraries.
Integrate third-party libraries and services for real-time messaging.
API & Data Handling:
Understand and consume RESTful APIs; handle JSON/XML data.
Utilize encryption protocols for secure message delivery.
Code Analysis & Debugging:
Study, analyze, and understand complex software application code in Swift/Objective-C.
Debug and optimize existing iOS applications, ensuring high performance and productivity.
Database & Backend Integration:
Work with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, MariaDB, or MySQL.
Have basic familiarity with NoSQL (e.g., Firebase, MongoDB) for scalable backend solutions.
Understand distributed key-value stores (e.g., Mnesia or relevant iOS-compatible alternatives).
Version Control & Collaboration:
Utilize Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to define project requirements and specifications.
Provide feedback through code reviews and mentor junior developers.
Testing & Quality Assurance:
Participate in software testing processes (unit testing, automated functional testing, integration testing).
Ensure code quality and maintain best practices and coding standards.
Documentation & Reporting:
Write, revise, and maintain software technical documentation, operational documentation, and user guides.
Provide regular task status updates, highlight challenges, and submit reports to management as per SLA.
Additional Responsibilities:
Perform any other duties related to the role as assigned by management.
Training and support for junior developers.
Job Requirements
Required Qualifications:
Education:
Bachelorโs degree in Computer Science, Information System, or a related field.
Experience:
5+ years of professional experience in mobile application development (iOS preferred).
Proven proficiency with iOS development in Swift and/or Objective-C.
Experience with Xcode, Cocoa Touch frameworks, and iOS development best practices.
Technical Expertise:
Knowledge of end-to-end encryption frameworks and protocols.
Experience with real-time communication protocols.
Familiarity with integrating third-party libraries for real-time messaging.
Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MariaDB, MySQL) and distributed DBMS (Mnesia or similar).
Understanding of NoSQL databases (e.g., Firebase, MongoDB) for scalable backend integration.
Proficiency in RESTful APIs and JSON/XML data handling.
Preferred Qualifications (Pulse Points):
Containerization & DevOps:
Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices.
Encryption:
Familiarity with data encryption for secure communication and storage within iOS applications.
Submission Guideline
Applicants are required to mention the Job Title and Vacancy # in the subject line of their email. Please attach your updated CV and a cover letter and send them to
hr@kabulspace.af
, with a copy (CC) to
kabulspace2025@gmail.com
. The application deadline is 10-Aug-2025, so ensure your submission is sent before this date.
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview and a demo session. We look forward to receiving your applications
.

About
                                            Behtar LTD (Behtar Group)
Behtar is a group of companies that has been at the forefront of the telecommunications, mobile money, and e-commerce sectors for 20 years. The company was founded with the vision of connecting people and businesses, and facilitating commerce in an increasingly connected world. Through the years, Behtar has grown to become a leading provider of telecommunications, mobile money, and e-commerce services in Afghanistan, with a strong reputation for innovation and customer service. Started as a small telecom service provider and quickly recognized the potential for growth and expansion in the financial services sector. we worked hard to provide innovative and cutting-edge solutions that could improve the lives of our customers. We were the first to offer high-speed internet and mobile banking services in our country, and as a result, we rapidly grew our customer base. With the passage of time, we continued to adapt and evolve to meet the changing needs of our customers, always looking for ways to push the boundaries of what was possible.
Today, the Behtar group of companies is a well-established and respected player in both the telecom and financial services sectors, known for our commitment to excellence and our ability to deliver results. We are excited to continue growing and serving our customers for many years to come.
Job Summary
The Digital Marketing Executive โ IT & Technology is responsible for planning, executing, and optimizing digital marketing initiatives to promote IT products, services, platforms, and technology solutions. The role requires hands-on expertise in digital advertising, performance marketing, content distribution, SEO, and analytics to enhance brand visibility, drive lead generation, and support customer acquisition objectives.
Duties & Responsibilities
1.	Digital Campaign Management
โข	Plan, execute, and manage integrated digital marketing campaigns for IT products, services, and platforms.
โข	Promote websites, applications, digital platforms, and technology solutions across multiple digital channels.
โข	Continuously optimize campaigns to maximize traffic, engagement, and conversion performance.
2.	Performance Marketing & Analytics
โข	Manage paid advertising campaigns across Google Ads, social media platforms, and other digital channels.
โข	Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs), including traffic, click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, and return on investment (ROI).
โข	Prepare regular performance reports and provide data-driven optimization recommendations.
3.	Content & Social Media Marketing
โข	Coordinate the creation, scheduling, and distribution of digital content, including social media posts, banners, videos, blogs, and promotional materials.
โข	Manage and grow the organizationโs presence across relevant social media platforms.
โข	Communicate IT use cases, features, and benefits through effective digital storytelling and campaigns.
4.	SEO & Website Promotion
โข	Support search engine optimization (SEO) activities, including keyword research, on-page optimization, and content alignment.
โข	Improve website visibility, organic traffic, and search engine rankings.
โข	Coordinate with technical and content teams to ensure SEO best practices are implemented.
5.	Email Marketing & Lead Generation
โข	Plan and execute email marketing campaigns and lead nurturing workflows.
โข	Generate, track, and qualify leads for IT products and technology services.
โข	Maintain lead databases, campaign tracking, and performance dashboards.
6.	Coordination & Communication
โข	Coordinate closely with IT, product development, design, and sales teams.
โข	Align digital marketing strategies with business objectives and product roadmaps.
โข	Support product launches, feature releases, and promotional campaigns.
Job Requirements
โข	Bachelorโs degree in Marketing, Information Technology, Business Administration, or a related field.
โข	Proven experience in digital marketing, preferably within IT, technology, or digital platforms.
โข	Hands-on experience with Google Ads, social media advertising platforms, and analytics tools.
โข	Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, digital marketing funnels, and conversion optimization.
โข	Excellent analytical, reporting, and communication skills.
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
โข	Growth in website traffic and user engagement.
โข	Lead generation volume and conversion rates.
โข	Campaign ROI and cost-efficiency.
โข	Brand visibility, reach, and online presence growth.
Submission Guideline
Interested national candidates are kindly requested to submit their application (Cover letter & updated CV) no later than 31 Jan 2026 to the below email:
kbl.hr@behtar.com.af
Note that the applicant must be based in Kabul.

About
                                            Quick Prime
Quick Prime Logistics is a trusted service provider in Afghanistan, delivering reliable logistics solutions for businesses and individuals. Alongside our core logistics services, we offer complete technology solutionsโincluding web development, mobile app development, and custom softwareโto help organizations modernize operations, improve efficiency, and grow with confidence. From planning and design to development, deployment, and support, Quick Prime combines practical industry experience with modern technology to deliver secure, scalable, and user-friendly systems.
Job Summary
Quick Prime Logistics is hiring
Intern Developers
to join our team in
Afghanistan
. This internship is designed for students, recent graduates, and self-learners who want practical, real-project experience with guidance from experienced developers.
No previous professional experience is required.
If you have foundational knowledge and a strong willingness to learn, you are encouraged to apply.
As an Intern Developer, you will contribute to real software products and internal tools. You may work in one or more areas such as web development, mobile development, or general software engineering, depending on your interests and team needs.
Duties & Responsibilities
Contribute to building and improving software features under mentorship
Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
Assist with debugging, testing, and performance improvements
Participate in code reviews and learn development best practices
Work with the team to understand requirements and deliver tasks on time
Maintain documentation for features, fixes, and technical notes
Collaborate with designers, developers, and product stakeholders
Job Requirements
Skills and Qualifications (Preferred)
Programming & Computer Science
Understanding of programming concepts such as OOP, data structures, and algorithms
Strong problem-solving and logical thinking
Familiarity with software development lifecycle and coding standards
Web Development (if applying for web/full-stack track)
HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Familiarity with modern front-end development practices (component-based UI, responsive design)
Experience or exposure to frameworks such as React
Understanding of back-end development concepts (APIs, authentication, server-side logic)
Exposure to Node.js, Django, Laravel, or similar frameworks
Mobile Development (if applying for mobile track)
Understanding of mobile app development workflows
Exposure to Flutter, React Native, or native Android/iOS development
Familiarity with app navigation, UI layouts, and integrating APIs
Databases & Data Handling
Understanding of relational databases and querying
Experience or exposure to SQL, MySQL, or PostgreSQL
Familiarity with data modeling concepts and validation
Tools & Professional Practices
Version control using Git and GitHub
Familiarity with issue tracking and task management tools (Jira, Trello, GitHub Issues, etc.)
Ability to read documentation and learn new technologies independently
Clear communication, teamwork, and time management
Quality & Delivery
Understanding of testing concepts (unit testing, integration testing)
Attention to detail and ability to follow requirements
Interest in writing secure, reliable, and scalable code
Note
If you donโt meet every preferred skill listed above, we still encourage you to apply. We value motivation, learning ability, and a strong work ethic.
What You Will Gain
Hands-on experience with real projects and professional workflows
Mentorship and technical growth through reviews and collaboration
Stronger portfolio and CV through practical contributions
Experience working in a team environment with modern tools and processes

PARSA in the local Afghanistan Market is one of the trusted partners in domains of web application development, mobile application development, value-added services, HR MIS, Finance Management System, SMS Platform, and e-commerce. We are glad to demonstrate through our work that we have the capabilities, people, processes, technology, and the desire to be the strategic technology partner of choice for many Afghan entities, including government departments, the private sector, and non-government organizations (NGOs).
PARSAโs primary objective is to develop an environment of fairness, honesty, integrity, and courtesy towards our clients, employees, vendors, and society at large. We areยcommitted to our customers & partners and have a passion for technology.

All Inam bahar products are produced in accordance with the internationally recognized HACCP and ISO 9001 standards.
Inam Bahar Dairy and Beverages Production Company is one of the leading manufacturers and distributors of dairy products, long life UHT milk,ยjuicesย&ยCream.
Job Summary
We are seeking a versatile and skilled professional to fill the dual role of Designer and IT Technician. This unique position combines creative design expertise with technical IT support to ensure seamless operations across both creative and technical domains. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating visually appealing designs while also maintaining and troubleshooting IT systems to support the organizationโs goals.

About
                                            VASTGLOBE LOGISTICS LLC
VastGlobe Logistics is a procurement-driven logistics company that specializes in finding, sourcing, and delivering a wide range of equipment, technology, and facility solutions large organizational customers worldwide. We work with trusted manufacturers and distributors, manage complex requirements, and coordinate delivery from suppliers to final destinations with a strong focus on documentation, quality, and on-time performance.
Job Summary
We are looking for a
highly disciplined, detail-obsessed International Sourcing & Quotation Specialist
to work
night shifts (not a 9โ5 job)
.
Your main job:
Find opportunities
Find the right items online
Call and email vendors to get pricing and terms
Prepare and submit professional quotations
You will be talking to different vendors every day, so you must be
fluent in English
(not โmedium Englishโ), a
strong critical thinker
, and have a
solid IT background
.
Duties & Responsibilities
Market & Opportunity Research
Search online for new tenders/RFQs and product opportunities based on internal guidance.
Read and understand basic technical descriptions, item specs, and scope documents.
Shortlist relevant opportunities and share them with management.
Vendor Sourcing & Communication
Find manufacturers and authorized distributors online for required items.
Contact vendors by
email and phone
during your shift to:
Request quotes
Clarify specifications
Confirm stock, lead time, and shipping options.
Follow up consistently until you receive complete quotations.
Quotation & Pricing Preparation
Collect all vendor price offers and organize them in Excel/Sheets.
Compare prices, lead times, and technical compliance.
Build clean, professional quotations using company templates.
Double-check all numbers, SKUs, quantities, and terms before submission.
Coordination & Documentation
Keep accurate records of all vendor communications and quotes.
Update internal trackers and CRM tools with status, prices, and follow-ups.
Work closely with management to finalize margins and submission prices.
Make sure deadlines are never missed and everything is submitted on time.
Professionalism & Discipline
Be
punctual
: login on time, attend calls on time, and meet every deadline.
Be
responsive
: reply quickly on email, WhatsApp, or internal tools during your shift.
Keep a professional tone in all communication with vendors.

Must-Have
Fluent English
โ very good spoken and written English; able to speak clearly and confidently on the phone with international vendors.
Strong IT Background
โ comfortable with:
Online research, advanced Google search
Excel/Google Sheets (formulas, filtering, sorting)
Email tools, cloud storage, and basic CRMs
Reading basic technical specs for IT, equipment, and machinery
Critical Thinking Skills
Can read a requirement and quickly understand what exactly is needed.
Can tell if a quote is incomplete or risky and ask the right follow-up questions.
Night-Shift Availability
Ready to work
night hours
(not a typical 9โ5), aligned with client/vendor time zones.
Attention to Detail
Very careful with numbers, quantities, SKUs, and dates.
Double-checks work before sending anything out.
Discipline & Work Ethic
Highly dedicated, reliable, and consistent.
Can work independently without constant supervision.
Communication Skills
Comfortable making frequent phone calls to vendors.
Clear and polite communication style (no slang, no unprofessional language).
Nice-to-Have (Plus Points)
Previous experience in:
Procurement, sourcing, or supply chain
Government / B2B tenders and RFQs
Experience using:
Online tender portals
Project management tools (Notion, ClickUp, Trello, etc.)
Knowledge of IT hardware, industrial equipment, or logistics.

Remarks:
As per Article 101, paragraph 3, of the Charter of the United Nations, the paramount consideration in the employment of the staff is the necessity of securing the highest standards of efficiency, competence, and integrity.
UNICEF is committed to fostering an inclusive, representative, and welcoming workforce. For this position, eligible and suitable
Female
candidates
are encouraged to apply.
Vacancy announcement is open to internal and external candidates. Priority will be given to staff in abolished posts and internal staff members.
Government employees who are considered for employment with UNICEF are normally requiredยto resign from their government positions before taking up an assignment with UNICEF. UNICEF reserves the right to withdraw an offer of appointment, without compensation, if a visa or medical clearance is not obtained, or necessary inoculation requirements are not met, within a reasonable period for any reason.
UNICEF does not charge a processing fee at any stage of its recruitment, selection, and hiring processes (i.e., application stage, interview stage, validation stage, or appointment and training). UNICEF will not ask for applicantsโ bank account information.
Humanitarian action is a cross-cutting priority within UNICEFโs Strategic Plan. UNICEF is committed to stay and deliver in humanitarian contexts. Therefore, all staff, at all levels across all functional areas, can be called upon to be deployed to support humanitarian response, contributing to both strengthening resilience of communities and capacity of national authorities.
All UNICEF positions are advertised, and only shortlisted candidates will be contacted and advance to the next stage of the selection process. An internal candidate performing at the level of the post in the relevant functional area, or an internal/external candidate in the corresponding Talent Group, may be selected, if suitable for the post, without assessment of other candidates.
Candidates who have applied previously do not need to reapply.
